trans_title: 科学如何改变我们的世界
introduction: Robert Winston博士在本节目中，将向我们展示半个世纪以来最重大的多十大科学突破。为此，节目中，他探访了一位现实生活中的女超人，第一批尝试男士避孕药丸的夫妻，以及他早期的一些使用试管受精的病人。他探索了宇宙的本原，人体思想的内在构造和全球最强大的激光。How Science Changed Our WorldProfessor Robert Winston presents his top ten scientific breakthroughs of the past 50 years. Tracing these momentous and wide-ranging discoveries, he meets a real-life bionic woman, one of the first couples to test the male contraceptive pill, and even some of his early IVF patients. He explores the origins of the universe, probes the inner workings of the human mind and sees the most powerful laser in the world. To finish, Professor Winston reveals the breakthrough he thinks is most significant.
chinese_title: 科学如何改变我们的世界
